Only house I own is the events house in the Bay Area. If I sold it, the house would see less use, unless bought by a big family, which might happen some day.

@leastImAlive @PPathole Yeah, sold my houses, except for 1 in Bay Area that‚Äôs rented out for events. 

Working on sustainable energy for Earth with Tesla & protecting future of consciousness by making life multiplanetary with SpaceX. Also, AI risk mitigation with Neuralink & fixing traffic with Boring.

@PPathole Exactly. Only time I sell Tesla stock is when my stock options are expiring & I have no choice. 

Btw, I will continue to pay income taxes in California proportionate to my time in state, which is & will be significant.

@WholeMarsBlog That‚Äôs where we get most of our lithium. Also, whereas phone batteries make heavy use of cobalt in cathode, Tesla uses primarily nickel, which is trickier, but has better energy density (range).

Iron cathode cells are now competitive for stationary packs & mid range cars.

@Ryanth3nerd @Tesla Moving lumbar was removed only in front passenger seat of 3/Y (obv not there in rear seats). Logs showed almost no usage. Not worth cost/mass for everyone when almost never used.

Prices increasing due to major supply chain price pressure industry-wide. Raw materials especially.
